modal.title: 16時間が、あなたの集中力を目覚めさせる
modal.description: インターミッテントファスティングは、食事をしない時間を意識的につくることで集中力・回復力・判断力を高める習慣です。
modal.note: ハードな断食ではありません。日常に無理なく取り入れられます。

benefits.title: What You Gain with Intermittent Fasting

trust.title: A Habit Backed by Science
points: Time structure linked to autophagy research
Widely adopted as a global health habit

modal.title: 16 Hours Awakens Your Focus
modal.description: Intermittent fasting is a habit of intentionally creating non-eating periods to enhance focus, recovery, and decision-making.
modal.note: This is not extreme fasting. It can be naturally integrated into daily life.
